accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is at least 4.5:1 against background. Use lighter grays for text on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Mago Trader' header as a fixed, glassmorphism strip.
The main view is a full-screen canvas for the remote browser. Ensure it handles resize events gracefully.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all UI text and 'JetBrains Mono' for any numerical data or coordinates.
Ensure the mobile experience supports touch events passed to the canvas.
Use the provided dark theme colors in tailwind.config.js.
Do not use gradients for the main background; keep it solid dark or subtle texture to avoid video compression artifacts in the stream.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (connection status, errors).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
